archimate:Requirement.name: AS.1.1.2c: c) test and verify the effectiveness of implemented controls in terms of meeting the needs of business stakeholders; complying with legal, regulatory and contractual obligations; and reducing information risk.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
